 On the longer video, (hopefully it uploaded) at 41 seconds you should be =
able to hear "hello Frank" pretty clear.  @ 45 seconds "that danm sumption =
has a video--", @ 1:01 "do a tape", @ 1:06 "Bruce will be double", @ 1:07 "=
you are Frank", @ 1:18 my comments, @1:32 "We are(n't) Taping here", @ 1:48=
 "we'll keep with Sumption", @1:55 "Steve--Is Watching Video", @ 3:03 "that=
's one of the boxes", @ 3:30 "vidoes of the speaker" @ 4:46 "look at the pr=
etty woman". There's more, and a bunch of layering.  I don't think the tune=
r is real selctive, there's only one IF filter on AM. FM operation is still=
 poor, but I'm still working on that. 
 
 Frank-S
